modName: Miracle of Sound ft Malukah - Legends of the Frost
summary: This is a simple Main Music Replacer I made using the song \"Legends of the Frost\" by Miracle of Sound ft. Malukah.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple Main Music Replacer I made using the song \"Legends of the Frost\" by Miracle of Sound ft. Malukah.

Link to the original YouTube vid : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0FLQ4rACE-0


Installation : Drag and drop the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim directory and merge/overwrite anytime you are prompted
Ex: C:\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim
	 
Removal : Go into your Skyrim Data -> Music -> Special from there delete the \"mus_maintheme.xwm\" file

_________________________________________________________________________________________
Credits

Written, produced, mixed and mastered by Gavin Dunne (Miracle Of Sound) 

Lyrics written by Gavin Dunne 

Vocals arranged and performed by Malukah and Miracle Of Sound 

Music by Miracle Of Sound 

Copyright Gavin Dunne 2012 
_________________________________________________________________________________________
I have explicit permission from Gavin Dunne himself to use this song and to release this mod. As such DO NOT use this mod in any other mod without both his permission and my own.
author: DimitrilAerinil
